caption.title: Summary of cell fates arising in the presence of various signaling factors.
caption.p: Cell fates generated after 72 hr of mouse micropattern differentiation with described cytokine combinations. It should be noted that cells do not detect these signals homogeneously. WNT inhibition (WNTi) refers to XAV treatment; ACTIVIN inhibition (ACTIVINi) refers to the absence of ACTIVIN and SB431542.

tr.td: Posterior epiblast PS Extraembryonic mesoderm Embryonic mesoderm
Anterior epiblast Definitive endoderm Axial mesoderm or Anterior PS
